frontmatter.title: Splunk - SAPM and SignalFx Exporters
frontmatter.description: Splunk has two exporters for sending metrics and trace data from the ADOT Collector. The SAPM Exporter sends traces to Splunk APM. The SignalFx exporter sends send metrics, events and trace correlation to Splunk Infrastructure Monitoring.
